messages.subject: Re: tea party chit-chat
messages.msgSnippet: No, different guy. :)  I will also point out that I don t agree with everything that Frank says in his books, but I agree with a lot of it.  We all know the
messages.messageBody:
No, different guy. :) I will also point out that I don't agree with
everything that Frank says in his books, but I agree with a lot of
it. We all know the difference between homeschooling and
unschooling. Well his books are kind of like homechurching vs.
unchurching. They are a nice first step and can lead to either
unchurching or church-at-home, depending on which way you go with it.
Sheila



--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "zenmomma *" <zenmomma@h...> wrote:
> >>Who is your Covering by Frank Viola.>>
>
> Is this the same Frank Viola that pitched for the Minnesota Twins?
I went to
> grammar school with him. Just curious.
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary
